column4: hello all - I'm a newbie - looking at configuring openLdap [slapd]  on my PC.  Silly I know but I can't edit etc/ldap/slapd.conf (I don't know vi and need su access so can't use the editor under applications ) - I could manage if there was edlin (I'm an old hat on DOS / WinDOZE)
